languages.text: "Грозовой клык", а теперь перестали морочить нам головы и расскажите еще раз, что вы здесь забыли. Только теперь — правду".

traits.locale_text: "Грозовой клык", а теперь перестали морочить нам головы и расскажите еще раз, что вы здесь забыли. Только теперь — правду".

languages.text: "Thunderfang, now stop playing games and explain again what your business is here. And this time I highly recommend the truth."
languages.original_text: "Грозовой клык", а теперь перестали морочить нам головы и расскажите еще раз, что вы здесь забыли. Только теперь — правду".

traits.locale_text: "'Thunder Fang', now stop playing games and explain again what you forgot in the area. And this time tell us the truth."
"'Thunder Fang', now stop playing games and explain again what you forgot in the area. And this time tell us the truth."
"Thunder Fang, now stop playing games and explain again what you forgot in the area. And this time I highly recommend the truth."
"Thunder Fang, now stop playing games and explain again what you forgot in the area. And this time I highly recommend the truth."
"Thunderfang, now stop playing games and explain again what your business is here. And this time I highly recommend the truth."

languages.text: « Croc du Tonnerre, arrêtez votre petit jeu et redites-moi exactement ce que vous faites ici. Et je vous conseille de dire la vérité, cette fois. »
languages.original_text: "Thunderfang, now stop playing games and explain again what your business is here. And this time I highly recommend the truth."

traits.locale_text: « Croc du Tonnerre, arrêtez votre petit jeu et redites-moi exactement ce que vous faites ici. Et je vous conseille de dire la vérité, cette fois. »

languages.text: "Thunderfang, Schluss mit den Spielchen. Erklärt uns noch einmal, was Ihr hier macht. Und ich rate Euch, diesmal die Wahrheit zu sagen."
languages.original_text: "Thunderfang, now stop playing games and explain again what your business is here. And this time I highly recommend the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Thunderfang, Schluss mit den Spielchen. Erklärt uns noch einmal, was Ihr hier macht. Und ich rate Euch, diesmal die Wahrheit zu sagen."
"Thunderfang, Schluss mit den Spielchen. Erklärt uns noch einmal, was Ihr in dem Gebiet vergessen habt. Und dieses Mal die Wahrheit, will ich Euch geraten haben."

languages.text: «Colmillotrueno, déjense de juegos y explíquenme otra vez qué les trae aquí. Y esta vez les recomiendo que digan la verdad».
languages.original_text: "Thunderfang, now stop playing games and explain again what your business is here. And this time I highly recommend the truth."

traits.locale_text: «Colmillotrueno, déjense de juegos y explíquenme otra vez qué les trae aquí. Y esta vez les recomiendo que digan la verdad».

languages.text: “雷牙号，别再和我耍花招了，好好解释一下你们到底是怎么回事。这一次，我强烈建议你说实话。”
languages.original_text: "Thunderfang, now stop playing games and explain again what your business is here. And this time I highly recommend the truth."

traits.locale_text: “雷牙号，别再和我耍花招了，好好解释一下你们到底是怎么回事。这一次，我强烈建议你说实话。”

languages.text: 「サンダーファング、そろそろふざけるのをやめ、ここでの目的をもう一度説明しろ。今度こそ真実を話すことを強く勧める」
languages.original_text: "Thunderfang, now stop playing games and explain again what your business is here. And this time I highly recommend the truth."

traits.locale_text: 「サンダーファング、そろそろふざけるのをやめ、ここでの目的をもう一度説明しろ。今度こそ真実を話すことを強く勧める」

languages.text: "Tufandiş, oyun oynamayı kesin ve burada ne işiniz olduğunu bir kez daha açıklayın. Bu kez gerçeği söylemenizi şiddetle tavsiye ederim."
languages.original_text: "Thunderfang, now stop playing games and explain again what your business is here. And this time I highly recommend the truth."
